title: Govt amends rules, exempts captive projects from transmission licence
description: The exemption from licence for transmission lines is already available to generating companies and captive generating stations. The move will encourage a new category of bulk consumers to emerge, benefiting from more affordable electricity and grid reliability, the power ministry said in a statement.
